name: Island Fortress
description:
The government has lost contact with a secret military research facility. Your mission is to travel to the island base and investigate. Your task quickly turns into a fight for survival as the automated defence systems attempt to kill you every chance they get.

  • Immerse yourself in a first-person shooter that combines action, stealth and puzzles.
  • Attack enemies head-on or sneak around them – it’s your choice.
  • Gather the items you need to uncover the truth of the enemy’s source of power.
